content: Where can I find a list of resource that are planned to go normative in R5?
FMG is confirming that list now. The proposed candidates are here: http://hl7.org/fhir/2021May/ballot-intro.html#candidates
That was the candidate list we proposed in 2021. We're confirming final list for 2022 right now
I was asking about this part: http://hl7.org/fhir/2021May/ballot-intro.html#process. Are we going to have a new page for 2022May?
It'll talk about STU vs. normative and some other stuff.

Lloyd McKenzie said:

That was the candidate list we proposed in 2021. We're confirming final list for 2022 right now

Where can we find the (draft) final list? I couldn't find it on the FMG confluence pages.
The 'draft final' list is what I pointed to. We're in discussions right now with WGs about what the final list will be and will land that on our call next Wednesday.
